nodes.text: Talfaglio was a reddish-orange planet in the Corellian sector.

It was located in Talfaglio system, the least-populated section of the Corellian sector, this planet was where Human League agent Pharnis Gleasry was able to meet Mara Jade and give her a message cube from Thrackan Sal-Solo for Princess Leia.
It was the site of a battle during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
